title: [97前無BNO自救] 新BNO政策已經違反咗國際公約, 應該從法律途徑覆核政策內容

replies.msg:
英國最新BNO政策對1997年前香港出世, 而當時又無能力自主選擇拎唔拎BNO嘅人係充滿歧視, 多嘅唔講, 最基本已經係違反咗Human Rights Act 1998 同埋Equality Act 2010。

佢份野Forward入面寫:
Before the handover of the UK’s responsibilities for Hong Kong, we created the British National (Overseas) (BN(O)) nationality status which was opened to people in Hong Kong, through a registration process, to those who had British Dependent Territories citizenship. This status recognised the special and enduring ties the UK has with those people as a result of our role in Hong Kong before 1997.
BTDC 1997年已經自動失效, 但係:
You’re a British overseas territories citizen if both the following apply:
‧you were born in a British overseas territory
‧at the time of your birth one of your parents was a British overseas territories citizen or legally settled in a British overseas territory

雖然今時今日香港已經係無人有 BDTC, 但係佢呢度寫得好清楚, BNO目的係關於當時個 special and enduring ties with those people ( THOSE PEOPLE 即係紅色字所寫嘅人), 但呢堆THOSE PEOPLE係包含咗當時未成年嘅群組, 而佢地係好明顯係缺乏能力去 go through 成個 registration process。

下一PART 個Overview 佢又寫:
Anyone who was a British Dependent Territories citizen through a connection with Hong Kong was able to apply to register as a BN(O) and apply for a BN(O) passport. People could apply for BN(O) status for a period of ten years prior to the handover to China on 1st July 1997. It is not possible to apply for BN(O) status now.
This is in recognition of the unprecedented circumstances in Hong Kong, the UK’s historic commitment to the people of Hong Kong through the Joint Declaration, and our unique obligations towards those who elected to retain their ties with the UK through obtaining BN(O) status.
同樣道理, 我97前未成年, 係唔ABLE 去APPLY TO REGISTER，我亦無能力去ELECTED TO RETAIN 我同你英國佬個TIES. 簡單講就係佢成篇野都係 Fake News 失實 亂9咁寫, 事實上係當時有一批當時未成年嘅人嘅櫂利係受到剝削, 而佢成個BNO嘅政策係基於錯誤同埋不公義嘅基礎下進行，出黎嘅產物自然係超錯!

同樣呢PART, 繼續有:
BN(O) status is a form of British nationality created for people from Hong Kong so they could retain a form of British nationality and connection to the UK after the handover to China in 1997 in line with the Sino-British Joint Declaration.
你係97前嘅people from Hong Kong 但你嘅權利因為你當時年齡同心智各樣情況而陷入極不利, 不能做出正確決定嘅境況, 講到尾就係受到嚴重年齡同出身嘅歧視, 英國當時無將呢班人嘅disadvantage 放入考慮之列。

講明, 呢樣野無論有冇新BNO政策出黎都係超具歧視成分, 但今次更嚴重係今次直頭影響英國最核心嘅核心價值:
The UK Government’s decision to introduce a new Hong Kong BN(O) Visa follows the imposition by the Chinese Government of a national security law on Hong Kong that restricts the rights and freedoms of the people of Hong Kong and constitutes a clear and serious breach of the Sino-British Joint Declaration.
英國承認國安法限制香港人權同自由, 即係基於上述歧視情況, 97前 0-18呢個AGE GROUP今日2020年嘅自由人權係進一步被剝削。

總括而言就係應該從法律途徑去REVIEW成個政策嘅決定係咪違反人權公約。唔好同我講呢堆人已經可以Youth Mobility Scheme 或者降低 Points Based System已經幫咗忙, 乜野大種乞衣, 我係從法理同西方核心價值去討論, 事實係成篇野係有問題, 97前無權自主決定亦係事實, 哪怕你話係字眼問題, 但最少要recognise 當時係有一班人無呢個自由去選撢。

同場加映:
英國比BNO逃生門, 係承認咗國安法對人權自由侵害, 97前無BNO如果感到人身安全有危險, 面臨起訴風險, 大可集體去申請Political Asylum, 我係英國佬寧願你全部5+1 收你六年錢, 好過全部過黎最少審批半年再呃屋呃福利。

其實重點係Convention on the Rights of the Child Article 7 and Article 8

https://downloads.unicef.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/UNCRC_PRESS200910web.pdf

Article 7
1. The child shall be registered immediately after birth and shall have the right from birth to a name, the right
to acquire a nationality and. as far as possible, the right to know and be cared for by his or her parents.
2. States Parties shall ensure the implementation of these rights in accordance with their national law and
their obligations under the relevant international instruments in this field, in particular where the child would
otherwise be stateless.
Article 8
1. States Parties undertake to respect the right of the child to preserve his or her identity, including nationality,
name and family relations as recognized by law without unlawful interference.
2. Where a child is illegally deprived of some or all of the elements of his or her identity, States Parties shall
provide appropriate assistance and protection, with a view to re-establishing speedily his or her identity.

The Hong Kong (British Nationality) Order 1986
Right to acquire new status of British National (Overseas)
4.—(1) On and after 1st July 1987 there shall be a new form of British nationality the holders of which shall be known as British Nationals (Overseas).

(2) Any person who is a British Dependent Territories citizen by virtue (wholly or partly) of his having a connection with Hong Kong and who, but for his having a connection with Hong Kong, would not be such a citizen shall be entitled, before 1st July 1997 (or before the end of 1997 if born in that year before that date), to be registered as a British National (Overseas) and to hold or be included in a passport appropriate to that status.

(3) Any person who, having become a British National (Overseas) by virtue of paragraph (2) above, ceases at any time before 1st July 1997 to be a British Dependent Territories citizen shall at the same time cease to be a British National (Overseas).
